snippet.title: Survive the Nights - Halloween Event Update (Night of the Living Dead)
snippet.description:
This video showcases the newly added drive-in movie theater. You'll find a film case while Trick-or-Treating. Use the film at the drive-in to play Night of the Living Dead. We'll keep the drive-in after Halloween and showcase other films throughout the year. 

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/541300/Survive_the_Nights/
Humble: https://www.humblebundle.com/store/survive-the-nights
Discord: https://discord.gg/survivethenights
Changelog: https://changelog.survivethenights.net
Forum: https://community.survivethenights.net
Twitter: https://twitter.com/STNgame
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/STNgame
Website: https://www.survivethenights.net
Merch: https://teespring.com/stores/a2zinteractive
